settings.hideSkeletonHatBones: 隱藏骷髏頭盔抵禦骨頭
settings.skeletonHatBonesBar: 骷髏頭盔可抵擋攻擊次數
settings.hideFoodAndArmor: 隱藏飽食度 & 裝甲值
settings.disableEmberRodAbility: 在你的島上關閉灰燼之杖的技能
settings.showEnchantmentsReforges: 於畫面上顯示附魔 & 重鑄
settings.hidePlayersInLobby: 在大廳隱藏較遠的實體
settings.avoidBreakingStems: 防止破壞西瓜, 南瓜梗
settings.stopBowChargeFromResetting: 弓箭在命中生物後不需要重新裝填
settings.showItemAnvilUses: 顯示物品已使用幾次鐵砧
settings.dontResetCursorInventory: 打開物品欄不會重製鼠標位置
settings.makeEnderchestsInEndGreen: 使在終界的終界箱顯示為綠色
settings.dontOpenProfileWithBow: 拿弓時將不會開啟玩家資料
settings.stopDroppingSellingRareItems: 避免賣出或丟出稀有等級以上的物品
settings.makeBackpackInventoriesColored: 背包內部顏色與外部相同
settings.avoidBreakingBottomSugarCane: 避免破壞位於底部的甘蔗
settings.replaceRomanNumeralsWithNumbers: 將羅馬數字替換為阿拉伯數字

messages.dropConfirmation: 再次丟棄此物品以確認!
messages.labymod: Labymod使用者請注意: 隱藏食物, 裝甲值以及血條, 還未完成。
messages.minionCannotReach: 有一個 %type% 機器人無法觸及到生物而停止運作了!
messages.minionIsFull: 有一個機器人因為背包已滿而停止運作了!
messages.deleteOldFile: The download has finished, please open your mods folder using the button below, close your Minecraft, and delete the old version (or delete it later if you prefer).

update.majorAvailable: A new major update, %version% is available! The link for the download can be found in chat.
update.patchAvailable: A new patch update, %version% is available! Look for the download link or to attempt to download the patch automatically!
update.downloading: The patch is downloading! Status: %downloaded%/%total% Please note that after the download has finished, you must delete the old file.
update.failed: The patch download has failed! Please download it manually using the link in chat.
update.downloadFinished: The patch has finished downloading. It has been saved as %file%. Please don't forget to delete the old file after closing your Minecraft. Click the message in chat to open up the folder.

messages.cancelledStemBreak: SkyblockAddons阻止了你破壞這個梗, 如確實想破壞, 請使用空手
messages.cancelledCaneBreak: SkyblockAddons阻止了你破壞此甘蔗, 如確實想破壞, 請使用其他工具
messages.cancelledProfileOpening: SkyblockAddons阻止了你拿著弓打開其他玩家的資料。
messages.cancelledDropping: SkyblockAddons阻止了你丟出快捷欄中稀有等級以上的物品。
messages.clickMoreTimes: 如果你真的想這麼做, 請再點擊或按丟出%times%次。
